name: Demo Form - All Features
description: Compact demo showcasing all question types and custom AI prompts

promptConfig.task: Evaluate if the project name is professional, clear, and memorable.
promptConfig.role: You are a project naming expert evaluating business project titles.
promptConfig.guidelines: Check for: clarity (easy to understand), professionalism (appropriate for business), specificity (not too generic), and memorability. Avoid vague names like 'Project X' or overly technical jargon.

questions.question: Describe the main business problem this project solves
examples: High customer churn due to poor mobile experience
Manual inventory tracking causing stock discrepancies
Slow checkout process reducing conversion rates

sections.title: Solution Approach
sections.description: Define how you'll implement the solution

questions.question: What type of solution are you considering?
List the key stakeholders and their roles

promptConfig.task: Verify the role description is specific and actionable.
promptConfig.guidelines: Ensure the role clearly explains what the person does in the project. Avoid vague descriptions like 'helps with project' or 'involved in development'. Look for specific responsibilities.

questions.question: What are the main features or capabilities needed?

attributes.name: description
examples: Support login via email and social accounts
Export reports to PDF and Excel

questions.question: System Architecture Diagram
questions.description: Upload or provide URL to your architecture diagram

questions.question: What are the main technical constraints or dependencies?
examples: Must integrate with existing SAP system
